agreement.checkBoxLongTerm: I hereby agree that I have read and understood the Insurance Contract MMB – Travel 1/2019 and the Terms and Conditions no. 3/2019.

agreement.iddDetail: The legal documentation for your insurance will be delivered to you electronically. The original paper documents can be acquired at any MONETA Money Bank branch.
bullets: Read the insurance information carefully for it states the exclusions and limits of the insurance coverage.

edit.insuranceTypeInfo:
If you are traveling alone select the Alone option.

The Family package provides insurance to your spouse, registered partner, or domestic partner (with the condition that they are a resident of your country of residence and are not a resident of the country of your travel) as well as all your children under the age of 18 (the number of children is not limited to your own children but includes even children from previous relationships). Family members are insured only when traveling with the client who arranged the insurance
edit.destinationInfo:
The Europe insurance package covers continental Europe, including the adjacent islands, and further to the territories of Egypt, Morocco, Tunisia and Turkey.
The World package covers the whole world.
edit.lengthOfStayInfo:
The short-term insurance comes into effect an hour after arranging your insurance in Smart Banka for as long as you desire.

If you travel abroad on a regular basis, you might benefit from the long-term insurance with a low monthly payment. In this case keep in mind that the total period of uninterrupted stay abroad must not exceed 90 days and that the insurance cannot be arranged from abroad. The insurance is arranged for an indefinite period with annual premium.

limits.param: Insurance of medical expenses and assistance services
Phone calls in case of hospitalization

limitsLong.param: Insurance of medical expenses and assistance services
Phone calls in case of hospitalization
Legal aid insurance and bail insurance in the event of a car accident

help.title: Have a look at the information brochure for the short-term and the long-term travel insurance
help.howItWorkTitle: How does the Family package work?
help.howItWorkDetail: The Family package provides insurance to your spouse, registered partner, or domestic partner (with the condition that they are a CZ resident and are not a resident in the country of your travel) as well as all your children under the age of 18 (the number of children is not limited to your own children but includes even the children from previous relationships). Package limits are individual for each insured person. Family members are insured only when traveling with the client who arranged the insurance.
help.regionDetail: The „Europe“ insurance package covers continental Europe, including the adjacent islands, and further to the territories of Egypt, Morocco, Tunisia and Turkey. The „World“ insurance package covers the entire world.
help.exclusionDetail: Coverage exclusions, or the cases the insurance does not apply thus the client is not entitled to coverage include but are not limited to:
exclusionBullets: the effects of drinking, or use of addictive substances by the insured client,
the continuation or recurrence of an illness suffered by the insured before leaving abroad, except in cases of acute deterioration of a stabilized chronic disease,

complications of infertility treatment, complications of voluntary discontinuation of pregnancy, complications of pregnancy after the end of the 24th week of pregnancy or complications of high-risk pregnancy or complications of childbirth,
Infection by sexually transmitted diseases, HIV, AIDS or hepatitis B or C.
help.exclusionInfo: You can find the complete list of exclusions in Article 12 of the Genral Insurance Terms and Conditions and in the Individual Insurance Agreements in the Specific section of the General terms of Travel insurance no. 1/2017
help.ifSomethingHappenedDetail: For any insurance claim contact the assistance service which is available to you 24/7 at +420 234 240 244.
help.validityTitle: How long is your insurance period
help.validityDetail: In the case of short-term insurance the maximum period is 30 calendar days. In the case of long-term insurance you are covered for 90 days of uninterrupted stay abroad. The long-term insured client is entitled to withdraw from the insurance within 14 days of the arrangement and will be reimbursed the unused amount of the premium paid.

bullets: A great travel insurance from BNP Paribas Cardiff Insurance Company
No forms to fill - arranged in under a minute
Short-term insurance for your holiday or long-term insurance for recurring travels abroad for you and your family
The insurance card and your emergency assistance contact in your phone
